name: City In Love
description:
Grow your city and help your blind residents to make them love you.

Your residents are maybe blind, but they won't love you blind love! You will have to work for that.

To help them you need to collect ingredients for a medicine. Creating medicines increases the amount of residents in your city as well as your score. Try to beat your best score!

Don't play in the browser if you have time to download, I suggest you download my game for better sounds, graphics and controls!

This game was built in only 2 days and therefore it might has some bugs.
